ISSUE.TITLE: What Zsh/Vim themes are shown in the marketing screenshots?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I love the minimal white `.zsh` and Vim themes I've seen on the website and in casts. Any pointers as to what setup you guys are using? ![screen shot 2017-03-13 at 10 07 39 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/275617/23866257/8229ecba-07d5-11e7-94a7-ae976492e055.png) ![screen shot 2017-03-13 at 10 07 50 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/275617/23866258/822b7ba2-07d5-11e7-86dd-45f31d83c844.png)
